name: NOT WORKING: Foreign Character
description: Trying to come up with an expression that is true when it finds foreign characters (usually higher than standard ascii).  Should not matter if unicode or UTF-8.
content:
This is a bit of test text to see if it captures foreign characters or characters outside the standard ascii range.  Basically we want to add this filter to our email, that if an email contains any characters outside this standard ASCII range, it rejects it.   

We can not read - nor have any business need for messages that contain these characters.

Subject: interested 如何规划产品平台？

author: Greg Jewett
